member.name: T:TisTis.Agent.Core.Api.TisTisApiClient
member.summary: HTTP client for communicating with TIS TIS API. FIX SEC-04: Supports certificate pinning for enhanced security. FIX SEC-02: Uses secure logging practices.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Api.TisTisApiClient.#ctor(TisTis.Agent.Core.Configuration.AgentConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{TisTis.Agent.Core.Api.TisTisApiClient},TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator,System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Creates API client with optional certificate validator. FIX SEC-04: Certificate pinning support.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Api.TisTisApiClient.CreateHttpClient
member.summary: Creates HttpClient with security configuration. FIX SEC-04: Uses CertificateValidator when available.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Api.TisTisApiClient.CreateAuthenticatedRequest(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: FIX S4: Creates an HTTP request with authentication headers. This method adds auth via headers (more secure as headers aren't typically logged). For backwards compatibility, the body may still contain credentials until the backend is updated to read exclusively from headers.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Api.TisTisApiClient.ExecuteAuthenticatedRequestAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod,System.String,System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: FIX S4: Executes an authenticated request using headers for auth. Wraps the retry policy and handles common response patterns.

FIX ITER1-A4: Fixed unsafe event invocation pattern
FIX ITER1-A5: Proper dispose pattern for BackgroundService inheritance

member.name: T:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator
member.summary: SSL/TLS certificate validation with optional certificate pinning. FIX SEC-04: Implements certificate pinning for enhanced security. Thread-safe implementation for concurrent access.

member.name: F:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.MinRsaKeySize
member.summary: Minimum acceptable RSA key size in bits

member.name: F:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.DefaultPinnedThumbprints
member.summary: Known TIS TIS production certificate thumbprints. Updated during deployment - add new certs before rotation.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.InitializePinnedCertificates
member.summary: Initialize the set of pinned certificate identifiers. Caller must hold _pinLock.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.GetValidationCallback
member.summary: Gets the callback for server certificate validation (legacy). Use GetHttpClientValidationCallback() for HttpClientHandler.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.GetHttpClientValidationCallback
member.summary: Gets the callback for HttpClientHandler.ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback. FIX: Compatible with modern HttpClientHandler signature.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.ValidateServerCertificate(System.Object,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain,System.Net.Security.SslPolicyErrors)
member.summary: Validates the server certificate. FIX SEC-04: Implements certificate pinning when enabled. FIX AUDIT-09: Enhanced validation for security best practices.

member.name: F:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.MinEcdsaKeySize
member.summary: Minimum acceptable ECDSA key size in bits

member.name: F:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.WeakSha1Oids
member.summary: FIX ITER2-C3: Static array of weak SHA-1 OIDs to avoid allocation per call

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.ValidateKeyStrength(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)
member.summary: FIX AUDIT-10: Validates certificate key strength. FIX ITER1-B1: Fixed SHA1 detection logic. FIX ITER1-B2: Added ECDSA/ECDsa validation. FIX: Migrated from obsolete PublicKey.Key to GetRSAPublicKey()/GetECDsaPublicKey().

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.ValidatePinnedCertificate(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain)
member.summary: Validates certificate against pinned thumbprints and public key hashes. FIX AUDIT-01: Properly handles X509Certificate disposal in chain. FIX AUDIT-06: Uses lock for thread-safe HashSet access.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.ComputePublicKeyHash(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)
member.summary: Computes SHA256 hash of the certificate's public key. This is more stable across certificate renewals than thumbprint. FIX ITER2-C4: Added exception handling for robustness.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.NormalizeThumbprint(System.String)
member.summary: Normalizes a thumbprint for comparison. Removes colons, spaces, and converts to uppercase.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.AddPinnedThumbprint(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a certificate thumbprint to the pinned set at runtime. Thread-safe for concurrent access.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.AddPinnedPublicKeyHash(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a public key hash to the pinned set at runtime. Thread-safe for concurrent access.
member.param: The SHA256 hash of the public key in hex

member.name: P:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.IsPinningEnabled
member.summary: Checks if certificate pinning is currently enabled.

member.name: P:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CertificateValidator.PinnedCertificateCount
member.summary: Gets the count of pinned certificates. Thread-safe access.

member.name: T:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CredentialStore
member.summary: Secure credential storage using Windows Data Protection API (DPAPI). Implements IDisposable for proper resource cleanup. FIX SEC-01: Clears sensitive data from memory after use. FIX SEC-06: Proper disposal pattern implementation.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CredentialStore.SetDirectoryPermissions(System.String)
member.summary: Set restrictive permissions on the credential directory (Windows only)

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CredentialStore.SetFilePermissions
member.summary: Set restrictive permissions on the credential file (Windows only)

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CredentialStore.Store(TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.StoredCredentials)
member.summary: Store credentials securely (thread-safe with file locking) FIX SEC-01: Clears plaintext data from memory after encryption.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CredentialStore.Retrieve
member.summary: Retrieve stored credentials (thread-safe with file locking) FIX SEC-01: Clears decrypted data from memory after parsing.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.CredentialStore.UpdateToken(System.String)
member.summary: Update auth token FIX SEC-03: Validates token format before storing.

member.name: T:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities
member.summary: Security utility functions for cryptographic operations and secure memory handling.

member.name: F:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.MaxCredentialSizeBytes
member.summary: Maximum allowed size for credentials (prevent memory DoS)

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.ConstantTimeEquals(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: FIX SEC-03: Performs a constant-time comparison of two byte arrays. This prevents timing attacks where an attacker could measure comparison time to infer information about the expected value. FIX ITER1-A1: Maintains constant time even for null/length-mismatch cases.
member.returns: True if arrays are equal, false otherwise

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.ConstantTimeEquals(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: FIX SEC-03: Performs a constant-time comparison of two strings. Converts to UTF-8 bytes for comparison. FIX AUDIT-03: Maintains constant time even for null comparisons.
member.returns: True if strings are equal, false otherwise

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.ClearBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: FIX SEC-01: Securely clears a byte array from memory. Uses volatile writes to prevent compiler optimization from removing the clear.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.ClearChars(System.Char[])
member.summary: FIX SEC-01: Securely clears a char array from memory.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.ValidateTokenFormat(System.String)
member.summary: Validates that a token has a reasonable format and size. This is a basic sanity check, not a full JWT validation.
member.returns: True if token appears valid, false otherwise

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.ValidateDataSize(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Validates that credentials data is within acceptable size limits.
member.returns: True if size is acceptable, false otherwise

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.GenerateSecureBytes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a cryptographically secure random byte array.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.GenerateSecureToken(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a cryptographically secure random string (base64 URL-safe).
member.param: Number of random bytes (output will be longer)

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.Redact(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Redacts sensitive information from a string for safe logging. Shows first 4 and last 4 characters only.
member.param: Number of chars to show at each end

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.RedactFull(System.String)
member.summary: Completely redacts a value for logging (no partial reveal).

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.SecureUtilities.ComputeHashPrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Computes SHA256 hash of a string for logging/comparison purposes. Useful for logging token identifiers without exposing the actual token.
member.returns: Hex-encoded first 8 bytes of SHA256 hash

member.name: T:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager
member.summary: Manages authentication token lifecycle and rotation. FIX SEC-02: Uses secure logging practices. FIX SEC-03: Validates token format before use. FIX SEC-05: Proactive token expiration management. FIX SEC-06: Implements IDisposable for cleanup.

member.name: F:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager.DefaultRotationThreshold
member.summary: Default threshold for token rotation (24 hours before expiry)

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager.GetToken
member.summary: Get the current auth token. FIX SEC-03: Validates token format before returning.
member.exception: Thrown when no valid token is available

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager.NeedsRotation(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Check if token needs rotation. FIX SEC-05: Enhanced rotation logic with logging.
member.param: How long before expiry to start rotation
member.returns: True if token should be rotated

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager.GetTimeToExpiration
member.summary: Get remaining time until token expiration.
member.returns: Time until expiration, or null if unknown

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager.UpdateToken(System.String)
member.summary: Update token with new value. FIX SEC-02: Logs token hash instead of token value. FIX SEC-03: Validates token format before storing. FIX ITER1-A3: Atomic update to prevent inconsistent state.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager.SecureCompare(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Securely compare two tokens using constant-time comparison. FIX SEC-03: Prevents timing attacks.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager.BuildRegisterRequest
member.summary: Build register request with current credentials.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager.LoadFromStore
member.summary: Initialize from stored credentials. FIX SEC-02: Uses secure logging. FIX ITER1-B4: Atomic load to prevent partial state on failure.

member.name: M:TisTis.Agent.Core.Security.TokenManager.ValidateTokenOrThrow(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates token format and throws if invalid.
